title: BRIEF-BP Selects Mcdermott And BHGE For Subsea Contracts For West African Tortue/Ahmeyim Development
text: 45 AM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-BP Selects Mcdermott And BHGE For Subsea Contracts For West African Tortue/Ahmeyim Development Reuters Staff   Mcdermott International Inc: * BP SELECTS MCDERMOTT AND BHGE FOR SUBSEA CONTRACTS FOR WEST AFRICAN TORTUE/AHMEYIM DEVELOPMENT * MCDERMOTT INTERNATIONAL - CO, BAKER HUGHES ANNOUNCED SELECTION OF FEED STUDIES IN ADVANCE OF EPCI CONTRACT FOR BP’S TORTUE/AHMEYIM FIELD DEVELOPMENT * MCDERMOTT INTERNATIONAL - EPCI CONTRACT FOR BP’S TORTUE/AHMEYIM FIELD DEVELOPMENT IS A SUBSTANTIAL CONTRACT * MCDERMOTT INTERNATIONAL SAYS DEFINES SUBSTANTIAL CONTRACT AS BETWEEN $500 MILLION & $750 MILLION
